Morbus satanicus. = The devils disease: or, The sin of pride arraigned and condemned The tenth edition, with many additions. By Andrew Jones, student in Divinity. Jones, Andrew, M.A.
[24] p. : ill. (woodcut)
printed for Elizabeith Andrews, at the White Lion near Pye Corner, London : 1662.
Woodcut portrait on title page. Signatures: A B⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
